sentence: Unfortunately, it is likely that Arizona won’t get out of using ERIC as long as the current Secretary of State, Katie Hobbs, is in office.
author: Joe Hoft
title: Representative Mark Finchem Calls for Arizona to End Participation in the Electronic Registration Information Center (ERIC) Like Louisiana Just Did

sentence: TRENDING: Newsmax Host Greg Kelly: "Kevin McCarthy Is a Swamp Snake and We Don't Like Him - In a Moment of Crisis He Wet His Pants" (VIDEO) The Gateway Pundit recently reported on a new poll showing Trump-endorsed Kari Lake is the only candidate who can win the general election against Soros-funded socialist frontrunner Katie Hobbs.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: EXCLUSIVE: Trump-Endorsed Arizona Gubernatorial Candidate Kari Lake: “I’m The ONLY Candidate Who’s Vowing To And Will Get To The Bottom Of What Happened In 2020.” (VIDEO)

sentence: This bill would not have been necessary if Katie Hobbs would have taken appropriate measures to be prepared for redistricting during a major election.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: Arizona Legislature Working To Repeal PC Purge Bill – Anti-Precinct Committeemen Elections HB2839
